page.title: 19CUSTOMS STRACATHRO
page.content: My name is Steven. Last night I went to Taranty Fair near Brechin. It used to be a Horse and Cattle Fair long ago but now it is just a funfair. It happens every year on the first Tuesday after the second Monday in June. There were lots of things to do there, some easy, some hard. I went to the Dodgems which was great fun. My Dad put the machine at full throttle and I had to steer. Im surprised with bashing into people that they did not have a headache. I was also on the waltzer but I am never going again as it was so scarey. At one stall you had to shoot a millimetre square. Even if you did get 21 points or over you only got a small cheap teddy-bear, which was not worth 30p. Though some stalls were not value for money, I enjoyed it all.
